title: The best Decathlon deals | Latest offers on bikes, bags, helmets, pedals and more
content:
We’ve taken a deep dive into Decathlon’s sale to bring you the best deals on new clothes, kit and accessories.

From wind-breaking gilets to Merino wool jerseys, there’s plenty of gear to get your hands on.

If you’re looking for more, you can check out Decathlon’s sale page in full.

Best Decathlon deals

Cycling Backpack Speed 520 – £69.99 £49.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£49.99).

TPU-laminated and PU-coated polyester fabric in a cheery sunflower yellow or stylish grey make this roll-top rucksack durable, waterproof and visible.

With reflective panels for extra visibility and a perforated foam back and straps, this rucksack was designed for urban cyclists to provide comfort and convenience.

The 25-litre capacity allows for easy storage of a laptop, notebook, and work or sports gear, which can be organised conveniently into multiple compartments.

Latest Deals

 

Triban RC 120 – £399.99 £349.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£349.99).

This 16-speed road bike is versatile and comfortable, making it ideal for inexperienced riders to progress on.

The design of the frame prioritises comfort, featuring an elevated steering socket and a shorter top tube, which results in a more upright riding position compared to a traditional road frame.

Latest Deals

 

BTWIN Folding Bike 500 – £379.99 £329.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£329.99).

Taking just 15 seconds to unfold, this bike switches from pedestrian to cyclist mode quickly and efficiently. With seven speeds and an aluminium frame, it’s dynamic and sturdy, making it a good option for commuting to work, or taking with you on staycations.

Latest deals

 

Riverside Original 920 E hybrid – £999.99 £699.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£699.99).

The Riverside Original 920 E electric hybrid bike is designed to elevate your rides with up to 90km of electric support.

Its three modes provide assistance up to 25 km/h, while B’Twin Trekking hybrid tyres, a Shimano TZ 500 7-speed freewheel and an anti-corrosion chain are also provided.

The battery is backed by a two-year/500-cycle warranty.

Latest Deals

 

Hybrid Bike Riverside 100 – £199.99 £149.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£149.99).

Equipped with a 6-speed single-chainring drivetrain and an adjustable stem, the Riverside 100 offers versatility and comfort for leisurely rides on bike paths, roads, and trails.

As the most affordable hybrid bike in Decathlon’s collection, it’s tailored to join you on occasional rides.

Latest Deals

 

City Cycling Helmet 540 – £44.99 £29.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£29.99).

The City Cycling Bowl Helmet 540 comes in a variety of chic colours, offering safety and comfort combined.

With thermoformed foam protection, 12 cooling vents, an adjustable fit, removable ear protectors and a VIOO Clip attachment for an LED light, it’s designed for daily urban cycling.

Latest Deals

 

20L Cycling Backpack Speed 100 – £34.99 £24.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£24.99).

If you’re looking to save a few extra pennies and you don’t need the full 25l or waterproof features of the Cycling Backpack Speed 520, this bag could be for you. With reflective panels, a roll-top, water-resistant fabric and airy foam padded straps and back, this bag offers many of the same features as the more expensive option.

Latest Deals

 

Electric Cargo Bike R500 – £3,299.99 £2,999.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£2,999.99).

The R500 electric long-tail cargo bike is designed to transport heavy loads on city roads. This bike can comfortably accommodate two children and one adult, or carry up to 170kg of cargo in addition to its own weight.

The bike features electric assistance and a 58Nm torque drive motor. To ensure you’re seen at night, there’s a Spanninga Axendo 40 front light (40 Lux) and a rear light with braking indicator.

Latest Deals

 

Hybrid Bike Riverside 500 – £349.99 £299.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£299.99).

Enjoy regular rides of up to 50km with the Riverside 500 hybrid bike, now on sale for £299.99. With adaptable 60mm suspension, hybrid road and trail tyres, ergonomic handlebars, and a 9-speed single-chainring drivetrain, the Riverside 500 is an affordable choice.

Latest Deals

 

Elops 27L Waterproof Bag 900 – £44.99 £29.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£29.99).

Save 33 per cent on this pannier bag by Elops. With 27 litres of capacity, waterproof fabric, taped seams and universal mounting, it’s a sturdy and durable choice for everyday commutes.

Latest Deals

 

RockRider ST500 (kids 9-12) – £229.99 £199.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£199.99).

Ideal for young adventurers aged 9 to 12 (135 to 150cm), this mountain bike is built for frequent off-road cycling. The suspension fork enables kids to explore more rugged trails, while the 18-speed setup makes hilly paths more accessible.

With reliable braking from two V-Brake pads and the convenience of a quick-release front wheel, this 24-inch bike offers exciting rides for your mini mountain bikers.

Latest Deals

 

Shimano MTB Pedals M520 – £34.99 £28.99

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£28.99).

Upgrade your cycling with the Shimano MTB Pedals M520, complete with Shimano SPD SM SH-51 cleats, spacers and screws. With a 9/16in standard thread, they fit various adult bikes and offer durability with a chromoly axle, stainless steel wings, sealed cartridge bearings and a two-year warranty.
